channel.title: General on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in General on Validated Patterns

item.title: OpenShift AI
item.description: This pattern is a starting point for using Red Hat OpenShift AI.

item.title: Intel AMX accelerated Multicloud GitOps with Openshift AI
item.description: This is extension of Multicloud GitOps pattern with Red Hat Openshift AI component to show the value of using Intel AMX.

item.title: Intel SGX protected application in Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This is an extension of Multicloud GitOps pattern with additional application using Intel SGX.

item.title: Intel SGX protected Vault for Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This is an extension of the Multicloud GitOps pattern with an additional application to show the value of using Intel SGX.

item.title: TravelOps
item.description: This pattern enables you to secure your applications using Red Hat Service Mesh.

item.title: Intel AMX accelerated Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This is extension of Multicloud GitOps pattern with additional application to show the value of using Intel AMX.

item.title: Intel QAT accelerated Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This is extension of Multicloud GitOps pattern with additional application to show the value of using Intel QAT.

item.title: AI Generation with LLM and RAG
item.description: This pattern demonstrates the deployment of a Chatbot application that leverages the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) in conjunction with the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework running on Red Hat OpenShift.

item.title: Multicluster DevSecOps
item.description: This pattern is derived from the multi-cloud GitOps pattern with added products to provide a complete DevSecOps workflow.

item.title: Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This pattern helps you develop and deploy applications on an open hybrid cloud in a stable, simple, and secure way.

item.title: Multicloud GitOps with Portworx Enterprise
item.description: This pattern helps you develop and deploy applications on an open hybrid cloud in a stable, simple, and secure way. It includes persistent storage for stateful applications.
